body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, shoemaker. Bavaria native. Married Maria Stellar Simon on May 3, 1849. Father of Caroline Simon, John Simon, Frank Simon, Mary Simon, and S. Simon. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1850 and 1860.
